ocrd-anybaseocr-binarize.description: Binarizes images with the algorithm from ocropy and outputs it as an AlternativeImage.

gray.description: force grayscale processing even if image seems binary

bignore.description: ignore this much of the border for threshold estimation

escale.description: scale for estimating a mask over the text region

zoom.description: zoom for page background estimation, smaller=faster

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on

ocrd-anybaseocr-deskew.description: Deskews images with the algorithm from ocropy and outputs a deskew angle.

escale.description: scale for estimating a mask over the text region

bignore.description: ignore this much of the border for threshold estimation

skewsteps.description: steps for skew angle estimation (per degree)

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on

ocrd-anybaseocr-crop.description: Detect the input images' page frame, annotate it as border polygon and add a cropped derived image.

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (used to zoom/scale during processing; overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when zero or negative

rulerRatioMax.description: ruler detection and suppression: maximum aspect ratio of bbox

rulerRatioMin.description: ruler detection and suppression: minimum aspect ratio of bbox

rulerAreaMax.description: ruler detection and suppression: maximum area of bbox (as ratio of total image pixels)

rulerAreaMin.description: ruler detection and suppression: minimum area of bbox (as ratio of total image pixels)

rulerWidthMax.description: ruler detection and suppression: maximum width of bbox (as ratio of total image width)

columnAreaMin.description: text block detection: minimum area of individual columns (as ratio of total image pixels)

columnSepWidthMax.description: text block detection: maximum width between individual columns (as ratio of total image width)

marginTop.description: ruler / edge / text detection: maximum y position to crop from above (as ratio of total image height)

marginBottom.description: ruler / edge / text detection: minimum y position to crop from below (as ratio of total image height)

marginLeft.description: ruler / edge / text detection: maximum x position to crop from left (as ratio of total image width)

marginRight.description: ruler / edge / text detection: minimum x position to crop from right (as ratio of total image width)

padding.description: extend / shrink border resulting from edge detection / text detection by this many px in each direction

ocrd-anybaseocr-dewarp.description: Dewarps the input image with anyBaseOCR and outputs it as an AlternativeImage

resize_mode.description: transformation to apply to the original image before input to the network

resize_height.description: target image height before input to the network

resize_width.description: target image width before input to the network

model_path.description: Path to the trained pix2pixHD model

gpu_id.description: CUDA device ID of GPU to use, or -1 for CPU only

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on (should match what model was trained on!)

ocrd-anybaseocr-tiseg.description: Separates the text and non-text elements with anyBaseOCR. Outputs clipped versions of the input image as AlternativeImage containing either only text or non-text elements.

use_deeplr.description: Whether to use deep learning model (UNet pixel classifier) instead of rule-based implementation (multi-resolution morphology).

seg_weights.description: Directory path to deep learning model when use_deeplr is true.

ocrd-anybaseocr-textline.description: Finds region polygons for each text line in the input image.

scale.description: the basic scale of the document (roughly, xheight) 0=automatic

noise.description: noise threshold for removing small components from lines

sepwiden.description: widen black separators (to account for warping)

blackseps.description: also check for black column separators

csminaspect.description: minimum aspect ratio for column separators

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on

overwrite.description: check whether to overwrite existing text lines

ocrd-anybaseocr-layout-analysis.description: Generates a table-of-content like document structure of the whole document.

batch_size.description: Batch size for generating test images

model_path.description: Directory path to layout structure classification model

class_mapping_path.description: File path to layout structure classes

ocrd-anybaseocr-block-segmentation.description: Segments and classifies regions in each single page and annotates the the region polygons and classes.

overwrite.description: whether to delete existing text lines prior to segmentation

th.description: num of pixels to include in the area region (when applying text/non-text mask from tiseg)

active_classes.description: Restrict types of regions to be detected.

post_process.description: whether to apply non-maximum suppression (across classes) on the detections

use_masks.description: whether to segment from the mask as polygon instead of just the bbox

min_share_drop.description: Minimum required overlap (intersection over single) of mask-derived contour area between neighbours to suppress smaller prediction

min_share_merge.description: Minimum required overlap (intersection over single) of mask-derived contour area between neighbours to merge smaller prediction

min_iou_drop.description: Minimum required overlap (intersection over union) of mask-derived contour area between neighbours to suppress prediction scoring worse

min_iou_merge.description: Minimum required overlap (intersection over union) of mask-derived contour area between neighbours to merge prediction scoring worse
